vulnerability.name: USN-4132-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4132-1 fixed a vulnerability in Expat. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Expat incorrectly handled certain XML files.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.

statements.status_notes: Expat could be made to expose sensitive information if it received a specially crafted XML file. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
